response.original_title: Super Zombies : Long Live The Dead II
response.overview: Thirty years ago, our world was forever changed and human race was brought to the edge of extinction. For decades mankind fought for it very survival. No one knows where the zombie virus came from, but we learned how to stop it and the threat was finally over. Now, with the worlds deadliest virus stolen, the human race must one again fight, but this time against a new enemy... one far more dangerous
response.title: Super Zombies : Long Live The Dead II
